name: Plants Vs Zombies 3
description:
We care deeply about the Plants Vs Zombies 3 franchise, and after our previous demos, we finally decided to take a step back and bring the franchise into a new direction.

Sorry if there are any bugs, for I do not care unless I get a wave of inspiration.

Also I don't if this runs for mac or linux so if it doesn't then comment down below, hit the bell icon, and subscribe.
